      • searchStudent

        public Student searchStudent(Student studentcriterion)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException,
                             SearchFailedException

        Search for a student based on search criterion

        Gets a Student based on a search criterion

        Parameters:
        studentcriterion - The student search criterion
        Returns:
        student returns the student that matches the search criterion
        Throws:
        SearchFailedException - The exception that is thrown when the there is a problem getting the Student
        SearchFailedException - The exception that is thrown when the student is not fetched
        java.sql.SQLException
